info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 2:24PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern El Paso County through 245 PM MDT... At 223 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northwestern Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Western Colorado Springs and Air Force Academy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
